definitions.definition: Beyond what is due , usual , expected , or necessary ; extraneous ; additional ; supernumerary .
examples: I don't mind doing some extra work, as long as I get extra pay.

definitions.definition: Over the top ; going beyond what is normal or appropriate , often in a dramatic manner.
examples: You unfollowed her for posting cat memes? You're so extra !
Wow, you're more extra than she is. You're the most extra friend I have.

main_definition: ( not comparable ) Beyond what is due , usual , expected , or necessary ; extraneous ; additional ; supernumerary .
secondary_definitions: ( not comparable , dated ) Extraordinarily good ; superior .
( comparable , slang ) Over the top ; going beyond what is normal or appropriate , often in a dramatic manner.
